StringTable.Label: SurveyModule_Dec
StringTable.String: The Q-1 Survey Module was constructed from Precursor technologies that were discovered at a dig site several years prior. This unique device allows the ship to investigate interstellar [HS=HS_Anomaly]anomalies[/HS]. Don't lose it.

StringTable.Label: StartingSurveyModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Believed to have been constructed by the Precursors before being found by the current user, Survey Modules make use of exotic technologies to penetrate the mysteries of interstellar [HS=HS_Anomaly]anomalies[/HS].

StringTable.Label: CommandShipModule_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderStat_Diligence_Icon] Increased [HS=HS_HitPoints]Hit Points[/HS] based on the Commander's [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS].[BR][ICON=LeaderStat_Resolve_Icon] Increased Attack based on the Commander's [HS=HS_Resolve]Resolve[HS=HS_Resolve].

StringTable.Label: CommandShipModule_Arcean_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderStat_Diligence_Icon] Increased [HS=HS_HitPoints]Hit Points[/HS] based on the Commander's [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS].[BR][ICON=LeaderStat_Resolve_Icon] Increased Attack based on the Commander's [HS=HS_Resolve]Resolve[/HS].

StringTable.Label: CommandShipModule_Resistance_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=LeaderStat_Diligence_Icon] Increased [HS=HS_HitPoints]Hit Points[/HS] based on the Commander's [HS=HS_Diligence]Diligence[/HS].[BR][ICON=LeaderStat_Resolve_Icon] Increased Attack based on the Commander's [HS=HS_Resolve]Resolve[/HS].[BR][ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] +100% Experience.

StringTable.Label: Lasers_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse OTO Nimbus Laser Array[BR][BR][HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: ParticleBeam_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse M103 Melera Light Gravitic Fusion Pulse Cannon[BR][BR][HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: Component_ExperimentalLaser_Dec
StringTable.String: An experimental laser system.[BR][BR][HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: Disrupters_Dec
StringTable.String: Walther X-2 Matter Disruptor System[BR][BR][HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: Plasma_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse M2000 Plasma Pod[BR][BR][HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: ParticleBeamX_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse M105 Melera Light Gravitic Fusion Pulse Cannon[BR][BR][HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: DisruptersX_Dec
StringTable.String: Walther X-3 Matter Disruptor System[BR][BR][HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: DisruptersXe_Dec
StringTable.String: Walther X-3a Matter Disruptor System[BR][BR][HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: PlasmaX_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse M2000A Omni Plasma Pod[BR][BR]Using 120 Terawatts of power, this [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]plasma-based weapon[/HS] system provides moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: PlasmaXe_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse M2000A-X Omni Plasma Pod[BR][BR]Using 130 Terawatts of power, this [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]plasma-based weapon[/HS] system provides moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: PhasedCannons_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse M3KA1 Phased Energy Weapon System[BR][BR]Delivering 175 Terawatts of power this phased [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]energy weapon[/HS] system, like all beam weapon systems, provides moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: DoomRay_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse MX-Z1 Phased "Doom" Ray[BR][BR]How this weapon system works is top secret. Even for you.

StringTable.Label: Missile_HypersonicMissile_Dec
StringTable.String: Banthar M1 Space Missile[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Stinger_Dec
StringTable.String: Enables short range missile attack.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Component_ExperimentalMissile_Dec
StringTable.String: Enables medium range missile attack.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Harpoon_Dec
StringTable.String: Raytheox M-4 "Avenger" Missile[BR][BR]Delivers a nuclear payload.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Phoenix_Dec
StringTable.String: Sandrala "Phoenix" Medium Missile[BR][BR]The Sandrala uses a fusion based nuclear reaction to do substantial damage.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: PhotonicWarhead_Dec
StringTable.String: Melera Heavy "Photonic" Warhead[BR][BR]The Melera delivers a devastating fusion reaction to the enemy.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: HarpoonX_Dec
StringTable.String: Raytheox M-4X "Harpoon" Missile[BR][BR]Enables short range missile attack.[BR][BR]Delivers an [HS=HS_Antimatter]antimatter[/HS] payload.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: PhoenixX_Dec
StringTable.String: Raytheox "Matadrox" Medium Missile[BR][BR]Delivers an [HS=HS_Antimatter]antimatter-based[/HS] warhead.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: PhotonicWarheadX_Dec
StringTable.String: Enhanced Melera "Photonic" Warhead[BR][BR]The Enhanced Melera adds a fragment of [HS=HS_Antimatter]antimatter[/HS] to intensify the reaction.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: TritonTorpedoes_Dec
StringTable.String: The GH-32 "Triton" Stellar Torpedo requires [HS=HS_Antimatter]antimatter[/HS] for its massive destructive capability.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: NightmareTorpedoes_Dec
StringTable.String: The Raytheox Mk. 76 "Nightmare" Stellar Torpedo creates temporary weaknesses in the fabric of space-time to deliver massive damage to the enemy.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Cannon_Dec
StringTable.String: Arsenal Mk III "Star" Cannon[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: PulseCannon_Dec
StringTable.String: Arsenal Mk V Space railgun[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: Component_ExperimentalKinetic_Dec
StringTable.String: [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: MassDriver_Dec
StringTable.String: General Destruction Pulse Cannon Mk I[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: VulcanicDriver_Dec
StringTable.String: The Copeland Industries Graviton "Gun" uses exotic materials to deliver a high rate of fire to decimate enemy hulls.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: PulseCannonX_Dec
StringTable.String: The General Destruction Mk I Railgun integrates a fragment of [HS=HS_Thulium]Thulium[/HS] to greatly increase the density of the projectile.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: MassDriverX_Dec
StringTable.String: General Destruction "Shredder" Pulse Cannon[BR][BR]Uses [HS=HS_Thulium]Thulium[/HS] to increase projectile density.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: VulcanicDriverX_Dec
StringTable.String: The Copeland Industries Enhanced "Vulcan" Gun makes use of [HS=HS_Thulium]Thulium[/HS] to deliver more mass to the target without increasing the side of the ordinance.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: QuantumDriver_Dec
StringTable.String: Meridoc "Quantum" Driver Mk I[BR][BR]Originally used to shatter subspace stream focal points, the Quantum driver makes a very potent weapon system.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: SingularityDriver_Dec
StringTable.String: Meridoc Black Hole Projector[BR][BR]Fires a singularity fragment (a tiny blackhole) at the enemy. Contact results in massive damage.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: PointDefense_Dec
StringTable.String: Shoots out a countermeasure to block enemy weapons.

StringTable.Label: HullPlating_Dec
StringTable.String: Adds additional [HS=HS_ArmorRating]Armor[/HS] protection. Can be stacked.

StringTable.Label: ConstructorModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows a ship to build a [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbase[/HS].

StringTable.Label: ConstructorModuleAuto_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows a ship to build a [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbase[/HS].

StringTable.Label: CargoModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows a ship to create a trade route.

StringTable.Label: SupplyModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows a ship to transport [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] to another world.

StringTable.Label: SupplyModule_Prolific_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows a ship to transport [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] to another world.

StringTable.Label: TransportModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows a ship to Invade planets.

StringTable.Label: AdvancedTransportModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows a ship to Invade Planets, and carries 2 Interceptor Drones.

StringTable.Label: SporeModule_Dec
StringTable.String: During invasion, the Spore Module kills the entire population of the world.

StringTable.Label: CarrierModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Carries 4 Fast and deadly Assault Fighters.

StringTable.Label: AssaultCarrierModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Carries 9 Fast and deadly Assault Fighters.

StringTable.Label: ReinforcedHullX_Dec
StringTable.String: Extremely expensive hull enhancement when cost is not a concern.

StringTable.Label: DivineTempleSupportModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Greatly boost all types of defense, on all ships in a fleet.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorProtectionField_Dec
StringTable.String: Greatly boost all types of defense, on all ships in a fleet.

StringTable.Label: ZalonDefenseSystem_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] Reduces all types of defense by 15% of enemy ships in combat.

StringTable.Label: Component_Escape_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] 75% chance to escape from battle. 3 turn cooldown.

StringTable.Label: Component_Escape25_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] 25% chance to escape from battle. 3 turn cooldown.

StringTable.Label: Component_Faction1_Dec
StringTable.String: This ship is unique to our faction

StringTable.Label: Component_Prototype_Dec
StringTable.String: Prototypes are unique, once they are destroyed they are gone forever.

StringTable.Label: Component_AntimatterBomb_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] [HS=HS_Antimatter]Antimatter[/HS] Bomb damages target and everything within 1 tile radius of target.

StringTable.Label: Component_RepairDrones_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] Drones can be sent to repair any nearby fleet.

StringTable.Label: Component_WeaponRange_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases the weapon range of the ship.

StringTable.Label: Component_PredictiveTargeter_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases the weapon range of the ship by [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]25%[/COLOR].

StringTable.Label: Component_SpawnLoireagClone_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] Can Spawn a clone of itself

StringTable.Label: Component_CrimeAOE_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CrimeIcon32] +10% [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] to Neutral and Enemy worlds in range

StringTable.Label: Component_CrimeAOEPerLevel_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CrimeIcon32] +30% [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] to Neutral and Enemy worlds in range

StringTable.Label: Component_Income20_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Credits_Net_Icon] +20% [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS] to the planet this ship is orbiting

StringTable.Label: Component_Income25_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Credits_Net_Icon] +25% [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS] to the planet this ship is orbiting

StringTable.Label: Component_Manufacturing20_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] +20% [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] to worlds in this ship's radius

StringTable.Label: Component_Manufacturing25_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] +25% [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] to worlds in this ship's radius

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_HitPointsCap_Dec
StringTable.String: Our ship's most valuable asset is a dedicated crew that is prepared for any emergency.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_Moves_Dec
StringTable.String: By improving the tools at our helm we can make our ship more effective and efficient.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_SensorRange_Dec
StringTable.String: A greater range of sensor equipment will allow us to discover more of the galaxy's wonder, and avoid its threats.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_BeamUpgrade_Dec
StringTable.String: We can increase the power of our lasers by powering them with [HS=HS_Elerium]Elerium[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_MissileUpgrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Even small samples of [HS=HS_Antimatter]antimatter[/HS] can improve the detonation of our warheads.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_KineticUpgrade_Dec
StringTable.String: Titanium and aluminum alloys are quickly shredded by [HS=HS_Antimatter]Durantium[/HS] composite munitions.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_AIController_Dec
StringTable.String: Allowing the AI to run our critical systems leaves us less to manage.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_VirtualBridge_Dec
StringTable.String: By replaying battles our crew can learn more from our victories.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_Cantena_Dec
StringTable.String: A place for our crew to relax, unwind and establish the bonds that will aid them in battle.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_ImmuneNebula_Dec
StringTable.String: Makes all ships in fleet immune to damaging Nebula Effects.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_DroneCarrier_Dec
StringTable.String: Carries 2 small but nasty Interceptor Drones.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_FleetShields_Dec
StringTable.String: Generates a basic Shield system for all ships in fleet.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_FleetShieldsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Generates a basic Shield system for all ships in fleet.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_FleetPointDefense_Dec
StringTable.String: Generates a basic Evasion system for all ships in fleet.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_FleetPointDefenseTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Generates a basic Evasion system for all ships in fleet

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_FleetArmor_Dec
StringTable.String: Generates a basic [HS=HS_ArmorRating]Armor[/HS] system for all ships in fleet

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_FleetArmorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Generates a basic [HS=HS_ArmorRating]Armor[/HS] system for all ships in fleet

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_WeaponRange_Dec
StringTable.String: Increase the range of the ship's weapons.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_WeaponCooldown_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases the rate of fire of the ship's weapons.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_Jamming_Dec
StringTable.String: Makes the ship much harder to target in battle.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_EnemyShields_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]Shield Strength[/HS] of the enemy fleet by 50%.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_EnemyShieldsTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]Shield Strength[/HS] of the enemy fleet by 50%.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_EnemyPointDefense_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Evasion of the enemy fleet by 50%

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_EnemyPointDefenseTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the Evasion of the enemy fleet by 50%

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_EnemyArmor_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the [HS=HS_ArmorRating]Armor[/HS] of the enemy fleet by 50%

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_EnemyArmorTech_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the [HS=HS_ArmorRating]Armor[/HS] of the enemy fleet by 50%

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_FleetAttack_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases the attack of all ships in fleet.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_ShipBeamAttack_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases the damage done by all [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam[/HS] weapons in the fleet.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_ShipMissileAttack_Dec
StringTable.String: Increases the damage done by all [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile[/HS] weapons in the fleet.

StringTable.Label: Upgrade_ShipKineticAttack_Dec
StringTable.String: Ship upgrade that increases damage done by all [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic[/HS] weapons in the fleet.

StringTable.Label: Component_AttackZOC50_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamAttackIcon] +50% [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam[/HS] Attack when inside borders[BR][ICON=KineticAttackIcon] +50% [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic[/HS] Attack when inside borders[BR][ICON=MissileAttackIcon] +50% [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile[/HS] Attack when inside borders

StringTable.Label: BattleshipModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Battleship class ships.

StringTable.Label: CommandModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Command Ship class ships.

StringTable.Label: FighterModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Fighter class ships.

StringTable.Label: BomberModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Bomber class ships.

StringTable.Label: FrigateModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Frigate class ships.

StringTable.Label: CorvetteModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Corvette class ships.

StringTable.Label: CruiserModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Cruiser class ships.

StringTable.Label: DestroyerModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Destroyer class ships.

StringTable.Label: DreadnoughtModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Dreadnought class ships.

StringTable.Label: CarriershipModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Carrier class ships.

StringTable.Label: SiegeModule_Dec
StringTable.String: A special module required in order to enable Siege class ships.

StringTable.Label: PrecursorParticleBeam_Dec
StringTable.String: Precursor Hyperion Shrunken Particle Beam.[BR][BR]This [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapon[/HS] is unusually small for its power and cost.

StringTable.Label: GaussCannon_Dec
StringTable.String: Novatron G-7 "Pulsar Punch" Gauss Cannon.[BR][BR]Utilizes magnetic fields to accelerate projectiles to devastating speeds.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: HeliosRockets_Dec
StringTable.String: Celestitech H-9 "Sun Scorcher" Helios Rockets.[BR][BR]Propels explosive projectiles with intense thrust, capable of significant damage.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: NeutrinoBeamEmitter_Dec
StringTable.String: Astrotech N-3 "Void Vaporizer" Neutrino Beam Emitter[BR][BR]Emits a concentrated beam of neutrinos capable of tearing through hulls.[BR][BR][HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: Component_PrecursorBoostEngine_Dec
StringTable.String: This ancient, salvaged Precursor engine is remarkably small for its power and cost.

StringTable.Label: WeaponJammer_Dec
StringTable.String: Versala Corp K-305 Standard Jammer[BR][BR]Uses Quantum entanglement to disrupt the probability of enemy ships being able to accurately target the ship.

StringTable.Label: TargetingComputer_Dec
StringTable.String: Elos Ltd. TX-5 Targeting Computer[BR][BR]Distributes a series of quantum nodes into a wide arc to create a sort of dynamic radio telescope, increasing the accuracy of the weapons using it.

StringTable.Label: PestMotherModule_Dec
StringTable.String: The Pest Mother can shed her parasites. They make a devastating invasion force.

StringTable.Label: Component_DigestionBattery_Dec
StringTable.String: Restores [ICON=Hitpoints_Icon] +40 [HS=HS_HitPoints]Hit Points[/HS] after every battle victory.

StringTable.Label: Component_MetamorphosedHide_Dec
StringTable.String: Adds a random modifier to [ICON=Hitpoints_Icon] Hitpoints between -50% and 50%. Recalculated after each victory.

StringTable.Label: FleetShieldModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Provides its [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]shields[/HS] to every ship in the fleet

StringTable.Label: IonGun_Dec
StringTable.String: TM and E ltd. EN-4211 Targeted Ionized Delivery System.[BR][BR]Fires an ionized blast of energy to disable a target's [HS=HS_PointDefense]Evasion[/HS] capabilities.

StringTable.Label: TimeDilator_Dec
StringTable.String: GravLabs Project 328 "The Time Dilator."[BR][BR]Uses intense bursts of gravitation to warp time dilation in a localized area to halt the cooldown of a target's weapons, resulting in a significantly reduced rate of fire.

StringTable.Label: CloakingDevice_Dec
StringTable.String: TM and E ltd. MI-4335 Acquisition Disruption System[BR][BR]Deploys a combination of visual and instrument manipulation to cloak the equipped ship, rendering the ship untargetable by enemy weapons.

StringTable.Label: NeutronScrambler_Dec
StringTable.String: GravLabs Project 152 "The Neutron Scrambler"[BR][BR]Excites the particles around a target to reduce the target's [HS=HS_Accuracy]Accuracy[/HS].

StringTable.Label: TheronRay_Dec
StringTable.String: Radiates a beam that disorients targets to such a degree it causes them to take increased damage. Only affects [HS=HS_CarbonBased]Carbon Based[/HS] lifeforms.

StringTable.Label: ShatteringPulse_Dec
StringTable.String: Emits signals that disorient targets to such a degree that it causes them to take increased damage. Only affects [HS=HS_SiliconBased]Silicon Based[/HS] lifeforms.

StringTable.Label: UVField_Dec
StringTable.String: Produces emissions that disorient targets to such a degree that it causes them to take increased damage. Only affects [HS=HS_AmmoniaBased]Ammonia Based[/HS] lifeforms.

StringTable.Label: VampireModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Meridoc Vampire Module.[BR][BR] Enhances the functionality of all weapons on the equipped ship, allowing damage done to targets to be absorbed and converted into repairs for the equipped ship.

StringTable.Label: ShieldBubble_Dec
StringTable.String: Provides shielding to the equipped ship's allies. At the start of combat, the Shield Bubble ensures all ships in the fleet have a shield at least as strong as a percentage of the equipped ship's [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]Shield Strength[/HS]. Ships with stronger shields are unaffected.

StringTable.Label: RepairNaniteCloud_Dec
StringTable.String: VTE Specialized Nanotech var. Repair.[BR][BR]A housing unit that produces a dense grouping of nanite drones that will repair structural damage. When an ally within range is damaged in combat, Repair Nanites will be released to repair the damage and restore some of the ship's [HS=HS_HitPoints]Hit Points[/HS].

StringTable.Label: Reflector_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the damage done by [ICON=BeamAttackIcon] [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam Attacks[/HS].

StringTable.Label: EWeb_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the damage done by [ICON=KineticAttackIcon] [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Attacks[/HS].

StringTable.Label: AssaultShuttles_Dec
StringTable.String: Short-range transport shuttles that allow Assault Marines to board hostile vessels. Assault Marines specialize in close-quarters combat associated with battles on ships. When Assault Marines successfully board and wipe out a ship, they claim the ship for the civilization, changing its ownership.

StringTable.Label: MarineModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Berthing units give housing and space to Defense Marines, which helps resist the boarding actions of hostile units. Defense Marines make it much harder for enemies to take over a ship.

StringTable.Label: NuclearWarhead_Dec
StringTable.String: Celestitech E-53 "Atomic Devastator" Nuclear Warhead.[BR][BR]A missile-propelled warhead that delivers a nuclear payload with a distinctive damage profile.

StringTable.Label: SuperHeatedPlasmaLauncher_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse M1K Crude Plasma Pod.[BR][BR]Launches sprays of unrestrained [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]plasma[/HS] at short range with a distinctive damage profile.

StringTable.Label: RipperNaniteCloud_Dec
StringTable.String: VTE Specialized Nanotech var. Ripper.[BR][BR]A dense grouping of nanites used to cause tear and cut at the external structure of a ship with a distinctive damage profile.

StringTable.Label: CausticWasteThrower_Dec
StringTable.String: Nurgit Weaponized Waste Recycler.[BR][BR]Releases a liquid-like compound of caustic waste that burns through a ship's hull with a distinctive damage profile.

StringTable.Label: HeatArray_Dec
StringTable.String: Walther B-9 Energy Transfer System.[BR][BR]Focuses radiation that causes heat to build up on a target, which can warp a ship's structure with a distinctive damage profile.

StringTable.Label: NapalmInfusedPlasma_Dec
StringTable.String: General Destruction Vacuum Resilient Napalm.[BR][BR]A mixture of plasma and napalm that produces a burning plasma that thrives in a vacuum and has a devastating and distinctive damage profile.

StringTable.Label: MassGravityDriver_Dec
StringTable.String: Copeland Industries Weaponized Mass Driver.[BR][BR]Launches magnetized projectiles at high speeds that warp gravity around them and have a distinctive damage profile.

StringTable.Label: PrototypeRailgun_Dec
StringTable.String: Arsenal Prototype 117.[BR][BR]A variation of the Railgun that utilizes experimental (often unsafe) technology and ammunition with very poor accuracy which results in a distinctive damage profile.

StringTable.Label: CloseRangeTurrets_Dec
StringTable.String: General Destruction Self-Defense Turrets.[BR][BR]A series of hull-mounted turrets that can hammer a target's hull with a small caliber fire. They only work at incredibly close range and do very little damage, but they can give a ship an edge in a hectic fight.

StringTable.Label: LeadBarrier_Dec
StringTable.String: Greatly reduces the damage done by Nuclear weapons.

StringTable.Label: CoolingArmor_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the damage done by Super-Heated Plasma.

StringTable.Label: EMPShield_Dec
StringTable.String: Prevents the damage done by Nanite attacks.

StringTable.Label: LayeredHullPlating_Dec
StringTable.String: Greatly reduces the damage done by Caustic weapons.

StringTable.Label: ReflectivePlating_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the damage done by Heat.

StringTable.Label: ExternalFoamExtinguishers_Dec
StringTable.String: Negates any damage done by Napalm.

StringTable.Label: GravityCorrector_Dec
StringTable.String: Reduces the damage done by Mass projectiles.

StringTable.Label: HS_Accuracy_Desc
StringTable.String: Accuracy is a rating of how likely a ship is to hit a target. Higher Accuracy scores make a ship more likely to hit its target with a given attack.

StringTable.Label: HS_TacticalSpeed_Desc
StringTable.String: Tactical Speed determines how fast a spacecraft can move in a combat encounter

StringTable.Label: GluonDisintegrator_Dec
StringTable.String: Astrotech M-8 "Anti-Cohesion" Gluon Beam Emitter[BR][BR]A highly advanced beam weapon that unravels molecular bonds using targeted gluon disturbances.[BR][BR][HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: GluonCapacitation_Dec
StringTable.String: Astrotech M-8o "Anti-Cohesion" Gluon Beam Emitter[BR][BR]Enhances beam weapons by increasing their gluon energy storage and discharge capacity.[BR][BR][HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: DisruptorPulseArray_Dec
StringTable.String: Walther Va-2 Disruptor Unit[BR][BR]A weapon system that emits powerful pulses capable of disrupting atomic and subatomic structures.[BR][BR][HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: Phasors_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse P5KA4 Advanced Phased Energy Weapon System[BR][BR]High-intensity energy beams with precise targeting.[BR][BR][HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: EnhancedPhasors_Dec
StringTable.String: Westinghouse P5KA4 Mk 2 Advanced Phased Energy Weapon System[BR][BR]Advanced phasors with improved beam intensity and efficiency.[BR][BR][HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: CoilAcceleratorArray_Dec
StringTable.String: Arsenal Mk XIX Rapid-Fire Railgun[BR][BR]Rapid-fire kinetic weapon that accelerates projectiles to high velocities.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: NeutoniumPiercerManifest_Dec
StringTable.String: General Destruction Neutonium Piercer Mk I[BR][BR]Utilizes dense neutronium to pierce through the toughest armors.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: NeutroniumEmitterCannons_Dec
StringTable.String: General Destruction Neutronium Cannon Mk I[BR][BR]Emits high-density neutronium projectiles for massive kinetic impact.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: EnhancedNeutroniumCannon_Dec
StringTable.String: General Destruction Neutronium Cannon Mk I[BR][BR]Advanced cannon that maximizes neutronium projectile effectiveness and speed.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: GravitonVortexArray_Dec
StringTable.String: Copeland Industries "Vortex" Array[BR][BR]Generates a controlled graviton field to create destructive vortexes.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: EnhancedGravitonVortexArray_Dec
StringTable.String: Copeland Industries Enhanced "Vortex" Array[BR][BR]Amplifies graviton vortex generation for increased kinetic impact.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: QuantumCatapult_Dec
StringTable.String: Meridoc "Quantum" Catapult Mk IV[BR][BR]Utilizes quantum mechanics to launch projectiles with unparalleled velocity and impact.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: HiggsFieldCrusher_Dec
StringTable.String: Meridoc Higgs Field Manipulator[BR][BR]Disrupts the Higgs field to momentarily increase target mass and induce catastrophic collapse.[BR][BR][HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] cost.

StringTable.Label: Missile_CerberusWarheads_Dec
StringTable.String: Sandrala "Cerberus" Complex Missile[BR][BR]Missiles with complex multi-layered warheads capable of inflicting cascading damage.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Missile_LeviathanTorpedoes_Dec
StringTable.String: Sandrala "Leviathan" Medium Torpedo[BR][BR]The Leviathan torpedo uses a shaped [HS=HS_Antimatter]antimatter[/HS] warhead and delivery system to devastate the enemy.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Missile_FuriousLeviathanTorpedoes_Dec
StringTable.String: Sandrala "Furious Leviathan" Medium HE Torpedo[BR][BR]The Leviathan Torpedo upgraded with weight redistributed to deliver High Explosive [HS=HS_Antimatter]antimatter[/HS] variant warheads.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Missile_IcarionMissileCluster_Dec
StringTable.String: Raytheox "Icarion" Cluster Missile System[BR][BR]The Icarion missile system uses volleys of [HS=HS_Antimatter]antimatter[/HS]-infused missiles to spread the damage across the enemy's hull.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Missile_OrionsSpear_Dec
StringTable.String: The "Orion's Spear" Missile Deployment System[BR][BR]The Orion's Spear system is a devastating single-target missile launcher that utilizes [HS=HS_Antimatter]antimatter[/HS] to shatter through enemy defenses.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Missile_TritonsRevenge_Dec
StringTable.String: GH-32 Specialized[BR][BR]Built upon the original Triton Torpedo design, Triton's Revenge uses [HS=HS_Antimatter]antimatter[/HS] and increased missile guidance to better focus its damage.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: Missile_KleinsDread_Dec
StringTable.String: Raytheox Mk 65 "Dread" Torpedoes[BR][BR]Klein's Dread Torpedoes strain against the fabric of space-time to quickly deliver destruction to the enemy.[BR][BR][HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

StringTable.Label: ComponentHarvesterModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows a ship to convert dead worlds into Mass.

StringTable.Label: ComponentArchitectModule_Dec
StringTable.String: Allows a ship to build Megastructures.
